caption:
The photograph depicts an elderly African American man lying on his side on what looks to be a hospital bed. He appears to be in a state of rest or possibly unconscious, as his eyes are closed and there is a nasal cannula in place, suggesting he is receiving supplemental oxygen. The pillow and bed are covered in light blue linens, adding a calm, clinical feel to the scene.

The gentleman's head rests on the pillow, highlighting his features such as his gray hair and the visible signs of aging skin. There is a distinct peace in his expression, and his face is prominent in the frame, conveying a sense of vulnerability and human frailty.

In the background, slightly out of focus, there is a stamp-like print on the pillowcase featuring what appears to be a caduceus (a traditional symbol of medicine) encircled with text, contributing to the environment's medical or hospital context. The image captures a personal and poignant moment within a clinical setting, evoking themes of care, aging, and possibly illness.
title: Ex-coal miner is now a black lung victim
